description: A plugable userbot with lots of features and special security modules

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

API_ID.description: Your Api_id get from @Api_ScrapperRoBot or my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Api_Hash get from @Api_ScrapperRoBot or my.telegram.org

STRING_SESSION.description: A TELETHON string session get from https://replit.com/@loverboyXD/SESSIONSTRING-GEN#main.py

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram Account id get from @JuniorLover_bot

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your bot username with '@' get from @BotFather

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku account Api_key..Needed to run Updater

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your App name paste Here also

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: A Private group Where You will get Your Account updates via your bot...IT MUST START FROM -100

BOT_PIC.description: A telegraph link of picture which you wanna to show in Assistant bot

PM_PIC.description: Telegraph link of picture that you wanna to show in PM_SECURITY

PM_TEXT.description: Text Which you wanna to show in PM_SECURITY

HNDLR.description: Your Command Hander of ASTRO leave it as it is for (dot)

NAME.description: Your name which You wanna to show in Alive

A_TEXT.description: TEXT Which you wanna to show in Alive

A_PIC.description: telegraph link of Picture that you wanna to show in Alive

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

SUDO_USERS.description: Id of those to whom you wanna to assign as Sudo users

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Needed to run Module of REMOVE BACKGROUND get from https://www.remove.bg/

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
